wikipedia_page.main: Dr Ernest Arthur Davies MInstP  (25 October 1926 – 8 March 2020) was a British Labour Party politician. He served for one term as Member of Parliament (MP) for Stretford in North West England from 1966 to 1970, when he was defeated.

response: *Ernest Davies (Stretford MP) (1926–2020), Labour Member of Parliament for Stretford, 1966–1970
*Ernest Davies (Enfield MP) (1902–1991), Labour Member of Parliament for Enfield, 1945–1950, and Enfield East, 1950–1959, Under-Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs, 1950–1951
*Ernest Davies (aviator) (1890–?), Australian World War I flying ace
*Ernest Davies, 93, British politician, MP (1966–1970).Announcing the passing of Ernest Dr Davies
